virtual graphics::Drawer* gaia::text::ImageSpan::getDrawer ( ) [virtual]

Your subclass must implement this method to provide the bitmap to be drawn.

The dimensions of the bitmap must be the same from each call to the next.

Implements gaia::text::DynamicDrawerSpan.
